main event: A civilian couple observed several groups of small light objects flying at a high altitude and speed in Logan, Utah on September 8, 1947.
interesting points: The objects were observed between 2230 and 2300 MST,The sighting involved approximately 5 groups of 35 to 60 individual lights each,The lights were described as yellowish in color,The objects maneuvered and were reported to circle around the city,The weather during the sighting was noted to be cloudy.
sighted object: groups of small yellowish lights in the sky
witness description: a civilian couple and five other unidentified people
